content: weight yarn cast on 4 stitches working stitches and knit through both then using provisional cast on method cast on stitches one from each needle as if to knit continue in this manner till all the stitches additional 84 92 104 116 stitches are used up total 88 96 108 120 stitches you got yourself a knit- on waistband the 4 stitches you cast on normally will form no sewing a little gap after you fold the waistband and will allow you to thread the elastic band skirt through later you can either leave this gap or you can sew it up afterward continue knitting in stockinette stitch for worsted version 14 rounds place marker and join for working in the dk version 16 rounds round be careful not to twist the stitches both versions * knit 4 sts make 1 by knit for 7 rounds knitting into the stitch below* repeat** to purl one round the end of the round knit 6 more rounds continue knitting in stockinette stitch for for dk weight yarn cast on 4 stitches worsted version 14 rounds then using provisional method cast on dk version 16 rounds additional 92 100 108 120 stitches both versions * knit 5 sts make 1 by total 96 104 112 124 stitches knitting into the stitch below* repeat ** to the end of the round the 4 stitches you cast on normally will form a little gap after you fold the waistband and continue knitting in stockinette stitch for will allow you to thread the elastic band worsted version 14 rounds through later you can either leave this gap or dk version 16 rounds you can sew it up afterward both versions * knit 6 sts make 1 by knit for 8 rnds knitting into the stitch below* repeat ** to the purl one round end of the round knit for 7 rounds continue knitting and increasing in this both versions manner until the skirt is desired length minus 7 5 cm/3 inches now unravel the provisional cast on and put those stitches on a second set of circular ruffle needles or you can unravel one stitch at the time purl one round next round *knit 1 yarn over* repeat ** to fold work in half at the purled round then with the end of the round the right side facing you knit first 4 sts then take the first stitch from a provisional cast on purl one round edge and put it on your left needle and knit it continue knitting in stockinette stitch for together with the stitch on the needle then worsted version 16 rounds place another stitch from the provisional cast dk version 18 rounds on edge on your left needle and knit it both versions *k2tog yo* repeat * to together with the next stitch on the needle the end of the round and so on until all the stitches are consumed ©
